analyzed: sura guru manda sauri guravaḥ ca gṛha aṃśaka paḥ
bahūni ambu agni ja keśava aindra śacikāḥ sūrya ādināthāḥ kramāt
vastram sthūlam abhuktam agnika hatam madhyam dṛḍham sphāṭitam
dreṣkāṇaiḥ śiśira ādayaḥ śaśu ruca jñagu ādiṣu udyat su vāśā avi
bahula sita gatāḥ syuḥ krūra saumyāḥ krameṇa
dvi aṅga stha budha vīkṣaṇāt ca yam alau kurvanti pakṣe sva keśāvi
tad yukta ivātam asi śayane nīca saṃsthaiḥ ca bhūmau
jaṅgha aṅghri iti ubhayatra vāmam uditaiḥ dreṣkāṇa bhāgaiḥ tridhā
prathama vayasi madhye antye ca dadyuḥ phalāni
sūkṣmī a ūha gahana āśramaḥ śravaṇa ruj vairam vidharma āśritaiḥ śāvi
vṛnda ūrvī īśa niṣāda dharma rahita irvaiḥ aṃśucaḥ snehataḥ śāvi
śreṇī grāma pura adhikāra janitā pūjā kudhānya āgamaḥ
bhṛtya apatya kalatra bhartsanam api prāpnoti ca vyaṅgaya tām śāvi
bahu janayati puṃsām sakhyam artha āgamam ca
pariṇamati phalaḥ āptiḥ svapna cintā sva vīrjaiḥ mālinī
na āśam vadet yat adhikam paripacyate etat
svām svām daśām upagatāḥ sa phala pradāḥ syuḥ
candrāt diś viphala iṣuka indra nidhana prāpti artha gaḥ svāt śubhaḥ
śukrāt ṣaṣ vyaya lābha mṛtyuṣu guroḥ karma anya lābha ariṣu śāvi
sura ijyā iva ālagnā dharaṇi patiḥ anyaḥ api guṇavān śikhariṇī
sa jñaḥ praśrita vākyam artha nipuṇam saubhāgya kīrtyā anvitam
vastrāṇām sa sitaḥ kriyā ādi kuśa lam sa arkiḥ punarbhū sutam śāvi
puryadhyakṣaḥ sa jīvebhavati narapatiḥ prāpta vittaḥ dvijaḥ vā
śākya ājīvika bhikṣu vṛddha caraka anirgrantha vanya aśanāḥ
pravrajyā balibhiḥ samā aparajitaiḥ tad svāmibhiḥ pracyutiḥ naḥ name
kāmī durbala jānuḥ asthira dhanaḥ śūraḥ aṅganā vallabhaḥ
śaktyā a pāṇi tale aṅkitaḥ ati capalaḥ toye ati bhīruḥ kriyā īśāvi
toya audyāna rataḥ sva veśma sahite jātaḥ śaśa aṅke naraḥ śāvi
strī dveṣī priya māṃsa kānana nagaḥ kupyati akārye ciram
vikrāntaḥ sthira dhīḥ su garvita manā mātuḥ vidheyaḥ arka bheśāvi
ślakṣṇaḥ satya rataḥ kalā su nipuṇaḥ śāstra artha vid dhārmikaḥ
kanyāyām para deśa gaḥ priyavacāḥ kanyā prajaḥ alpa ātmajaḥ śāvi
vaktā sthūla rada śravaḥ adhara nasaḥ karmā udyataḥ śilpa vid
bandhu dviṣ na balāt sama eti ca vaṃśa sāmnaḥ eka sādhyaḥ aśvajaḥ śāvi
svakṣaḥ kṣāma kaṭiḥ gṛhīta vacanaḥ saubhāgya yuktaḥ alasaḥ
kumbha sthite bhaume bhūri dhana ātmajaḥ mṛga gate bhūpaḥ athavā tad samaḥ
siṃhe syāt balanāyakaḥ suragurau proktam ca yat canrabhe
kumbhe karkaṭa vat phalāni makare nīcaḥ alpa vittaḥ asukhī īśa avi
meṣa isa svar timiranayanaḥ siṃha saṃsthe niśā adhas
sva ṛkṣa ja ucca gate dhanī bahu sutaḥ sa svar kuṭumbī dhane
saubhāgya ātmaja mitra bandhu dhana bhāj dharma sthite śītagau
tejaḥ ati sāhasa yutaḥ ca kuje sva bhāge
śilpī tri aṃśe śaśi suta yuta ika indra saṃstha arki dṛṣṭe
nīcaḥ arka indrvoḥ madana gatayoḥ dṛṣṭayoḥ sūryajena
n r ācāra ākula ṭa arka bhe nṛpa vadhūḥ puṃśceṣṭita āgamya gā
dāsī nīca rata arki bhepati ratā duṣṭā prajā sva aṃśa kaiḥśāvi
krūre hīna bale asta ge sva patinā saumya īkṣite projjhitā
dyūn eva ayadi śītaraśmi sahitau bhartuḥ tadā anujñayā aśāvi
vikhyāta a bhuvina eka śāstra nipuṇa a strī brahma vādinī apiśāvi
sa prakṣīṇa hima aṃśubhiḥ ca yugapad pāpaiḥ trikoṇa ādya gaiḥ
kāṣṭhena abhihataḥ prayāti maraṇam sūrya ātmajena īkṣita īśāvi
yantra autpīḍana jaḥ kuje astamaya ge saura aindunā abhyudgame
ca kalatra sutān manasā aiti tulā adhara madhya gataḥ troṭaka
